title: RIOT, FIX UR GAME!!!!
body: Today, I finally have time to play some game, after my happy 5 AFK, I played many games. At last, when the game was loading. everything got stuck! when the game start, i cant moe, cant send message, cant buy anything. after i restart my PC my great team remake the game and i got 5 AFK! THANK YOU RIOT, NOW FIX YOUR GAME AND MAKE SURE THE FKIN A F K IS IN THE RIGHT PLAYER!!!!
